message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features and benefits that we believe will greatly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I am offering it to you for $180. I trust this price reflects the value you will receive from our product.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're adding to the product. However, I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible for you to consider a lower price? Perhaps around $100?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and would like to make a proposal that respects your financial considerations while still reflecting the value of our product. For your convenience, I am now offering the product for $120. I hope this price aligns better with your expectations while still allowing me to fairly compensate for the value provided.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $110 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.
